## Service Description

The Office of the Auditor General of Canada (OAG) is seeking a Senior Procurement Specialist to support the development of procurement guides, processes, and tools. The contract duration will be for an initial period of eight (8) months, with an option to extend for up to three (3) additional four-month periods.

## Notice Details

* **Notice Type:** Demande de Proposition
* **Procurement Method:** Concurrentielle - Appel d'offres sélectif
* **Selection Criteria:** Prix le plus bas
* **Trade Agreements:** The contract may be subject to several trade agreements, including the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA) and the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).

## Contractual Requirements

* The successful candidate will be required to work with OAG staff to review and refine existing procurement guides, processes, and tools.
* The successful candidate will be required to design, develop, and implement new procurement guides, processes, and tools.
* The contract will be subject to the Canada Gazette and will be awarded based on lowest price.
